An older man first appears in the middle ground, partially visible as he peeks out from a doorway on the left side of the frame. Next, a person in a pink sweater emerges from a doorway in the middle ground on the left, their full body visible as they walk down the central aisle toward the foreground before exiting the frame to the left. Following this, the older man and a woman in a poncho emerge from the same left-side doorway in the middle ground, captured in a full shot as they walk together down the center of the aisle toward the camera. The man exits to the left in the foreground, while the woman continues walking forward, transitioning the frame to a medium full shot of her in the foreground. Finally, another man appears behind her, emerging from the middle ground on the left. The camera remains stationary and at the subjects' height throughout.
